about_the_game:
Get ready for the most sensual and luxurious VR experience ever created!

Luxury Girls transports you into a world filled with stunning women, exclusive locations, and unforgettable moments. This is your chance to live out sensual adventures like never before. Chat with gorgeous girls, travel to luxurious destinations, and then... let your fantasies come to life!

Whether it's a private penthouse, a mountain resort, or a luxury yacht, each woman is waiting for you, ready to fulfill your deepest desires. But that's not all! In Luxury Girls, you have full control – grab the girls by their hands, legs, and hips, positioning them exactly how you want to fully enjoy every moment. You’ll also have access to four different dildos for penetration, and the characters react to your every move – including the ability to get a CUMSHOTS!!!!

Why Luxury Girls is the game you can’t miss:

  • Sensual encounters: Every conversation quickly leads to what really matters – passionate, intimate moments that will stay with you for a long time.

  • Exclusive locations: Explore a world of luxury and discover breathtaking destinations where exceptional women are ready to indulge your every fantasy.

  • Full control: In Luxury Girls, you’re in charge of how these moments unfold. Grab the girls by the hands, legs, and hips – it’s all in your hands!

  • Intimate toys: With four different dildos at your disposal, your experience becomes even more thrilling.

  • Realistic reactions: Enjoy a lifelike experience – from subtle reactions to full CUMSHOTS. What you do truly matters.

  • Luxury travel: Private jets, helicopters, yachts – your journeys will be just as exclusive as the moments you share with the girls.

  • VR like never before: Immerse yourself completely in the world of Luxury Girls, where every moment is more real and sensual than ever thanks to full VR support.

What makes this game special?

If you’re looking for a game that offers true luxury, control, and sensual adventures – Luxury Girls is exactly what you need. This isn’t just a game – it’s a journey through a world full of passion, luxury, and incredible experiences!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

- Genitalia
- Naked Female
- Penetration

name: Luxury GIRLS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
